item.title: Intro - Brakes & Suspension
item.content:encoded: Your vehicle’s brakes and suspension systems are critical for both safety and comfort. At Auto Center, we specialize in maintaining and repairing these vital components to ensure your vehicle performs reliably in all driving conditions. Whether it’s a routine brake pad replacement or a suspension overhaul, our skilled technicians use advanced tools and techniques to keep your car running smoothly and safely.

item.title: Why Choose - Brakes & Suspension
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose Auto Center for Brake & Suspension Services?

  • Experienced Technicians: Our ASE-certified mechanics specialize in diagnosing and repairing brake and suspension systems for all vehicle makes and models.
  • Cutting-Edge Equipment: We use advanced diagnostic tools and equipment to provide accurate, efficient service.
  • High-Quality Parts: We only use premium parts that meet or exceed manufacturer standards to ensure reliable performance and durability.
  • Transparent Pricing: We offer clear, upfront pricing on all services, so you know exactly what to expect.

Trust Auto Center to keep your brakes and suspension in top condition, ensuring a safe, smooth, and enjoyable driving experience every time.

item.title: Services - Brakes & Suspension
item.content:encoded:
Routine brake and suspension services we offer

1. Brake Services

Your vehicle's brakes are its most important safety feature, and maintaining them is essential for your safety and that of others on the road. At Auto Center, we offer comprehensive brake services, from simple brake pad replacements to complete system inspections and repairs. If you’ve noticed squeaking, grinding, or decreased stopping power, it’s time to get your brakes checked.

Brake Pad Replacement

Brake pads wear out over time and must be replaced to ensure safe stopping distances. Our team will inspect your brake pads and replace them with high-quality parts that meet or exceed OEM standards.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Worn brake pads can reduce braking efficiency, increase stopping distance, and damage other brake components like rotors. Regular replacement helps prevent costly repairs and keeps you safe on the road.
  • Service Includes:
    • Removal and replacement of worn brake pads
    • Inspection of brake rotors, calipers, and other components
    • Application of brake lubricant to reduce noise and extend part life

Brake Rotor Resurfacing & Replacement

Brake rotors can become warped or worn over time, leading to vibrations when braking or decreased stopping power. We offer rotor resurfacing to smooth out imperfections or, if needed, complete replacement.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Smooth, even rotors are critical for efficient braking. Warped or worn rotors can cause your vehicle to shake when you apply the brakes, reducing safety and comfort.
  • Service Includes:
    • Resurfacing or replacing brake rotors based on wear
    • Ensuring proper alignment of brake components
    • Test drive to confirm smooth braking performance

Brake Fluid Replacement

Brake fluid is essential for hydraulic brake systems. Over time, moisture can accumulate in the brake fluid, reducing its effectiveness and leading to brake failure. We’ll check and replace your brake fluid as needed to ensure your brakes function correctly.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Fresh brake fluid helps maintain braking power and responsiveness. Old or contaminated fluid can lead to poor brake performance and, in extreme cases, brake failure.
  • Service Includes:
    • Flushing out old brake fluid
    • Replacing with new, manufacturer-recommended brake fluid
    • Bleeding the brakes to ensure proper fluid circulation

Complete Brake Inspection

If you're experiencing any brake-related issues, our technicians can perform a thorough inspection of your entire brake system, including pads, rotors, calipers, hoses, and the brake fluid system. This inspection helps identify potential issues before they become more serious or costly.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Regular brake inspections ensure that your entire braking system is functioning properly, giving you peace of mind and preventing unexpected breakdowns.
  • Service Includes:
    • Visual and mechanical inspection of all brake components
    • Testing brake performance under various conditions
    • Providing a detailed report and recommended services

2. Suspension & Steering Services

The suspension and steering system in your vehicle ensures a smooth, comfortable ride and maintains control on the road. Whether you're noticing unusual noises, a rough ride, or steering issues, our suspension services are designed to diagnose and resolve problems efficiently.

Shock & Strut Replacement

Shocks and struts are vital to the smoothness of your ride and the control of your vehicle. Over time, they wear out, leading to a rough ride, poor handling, and increased tire wear. We replace worn shocks and struts with high-quality parts to restore your vehicle’s ride comfort and stability.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Worn shocks and struts affect your vehicle’s ability to absorb bumps and maintain tire contact with the road, leading to decreased handling and safety.
  • Service Includes:
    • Removal of old shocks and struts
    • Installation of new, manufacturer-approved parts
    • Test drive to ensure improved ride quality

Suspension Inspection & Repair

Your vehicle’s suspension system is made up of many components, including control arms, bushings, ball joints, and springs. Our comprehensive suspension inspection will identify worn or damaged parts that could be affecting your ride quality or steering control.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A damaged suspension system can lead to uneven tire wear, poor handling, and even loss of control in extreme cases. Early detection of suspension issues prevents further damage and ensures safe driving.
  • Service Includes:
    • Full inspection of all suspension components
    • Identification of worn or damaged parts
    • Replacement of necessary components to restore suspension performance

Wheel Alignment & Steering Adjustments

Proper wheel alignment is essential for maintaining even tire wear, precise steering, and fuel efficiency. If your vehicle is pulling to one side or the steering wheel feels off-center, it’s likely time for a wheel alignment. Our advanced alignment machines ensure your wheels are aligned according to your vehicle’s specifications.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Misaligned wheels cause uneven tire wear, reduced fuel efficiency, and poor handling. Regular wheel alignments ensure your vehicle drives straight and handles properly.
  • Service Includes:
    • Adjusting the angles of your wheels (toe, camber, caster)
    • Ensuring proper alignment for improved steering and handling
    • Test drive to confirm proper alignment and performance

Power Steering Repair

If your steering feels heavy, noisy, or unresponsive, there may be an issue with your power steering system. Our team can diagnose and repair problems with the power steering pump, fluid, or system components to ensure smooth, responsive steering.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A malfunctioning power steering system makes it difficult to control your vehicle, which is especially dangerous in emergency situations or at high speeds.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspection of power steering system and fluid levels
    • Repair or replacement of pumps, hoses, or steering components
    • Power steering fluid flush and refill

item.title: Intro - Engine & Transmission
item.content:encoded: Your vehicle’s engine and transmission are the heart and soul of its performance. Regular maintenance and timely repairs are essential to ensure your vehicle runs smoothly, efficiently, and reliably. At Auto Center, our skilled technicians specialize in engine and transmission services that help prevent costly breakdowns and extend the life of your vehicle. Whether you're dealing with an engine problem or need transmission work, we’re here to keep your vehicle in top shape.

item.title: Services - Engine & Transmission
item.content:encoded:
Engine and transmission services we offer

1. Engine Diagnostics & Repair

Your vehicle’s engine is a complex system, and when something goes wrong, it’s important to diagnose and repair the issue quickly to avoid more serious damage. At Auto Center, we use state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to identify problems and recommend the best course of action. Whether it's a minor issue or a major repair, our team has the expertise to get your engine running smoothly again.

Engine Diagnostics

If your "Check Engine" light is on, or if you're experiencing strange noises, loss of power, or poor fuel efficiency, it’s time to get your engine checked. Our comprehensive diagnostic service will identify the root cause of the issue using the latest computer diagnostic tools.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Ignoring engine warning lights or unusual symptoms can lead to more severe engine damage. Early diagnosis can prevent major repairs and keep your engine running efficiently.
  • Service Includes:
    • Computerized diagnostics to retrieve engine error codes
    • Thorough inspection of engine components
    • Explanation of diagnostic results and recommended repairs

Engine Repair & Rebuilds

Whether your engine needs a minor repair, like a gasket replacement, or a full rebuild, we can handle it. Our experienced technicians are equipped to perform repairs on all types of engines, restoring power and efficiency to your vehicle.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Timely engine repairs prevent further damage and extend the life of your vehicle. A well-maintained engine ensures optimal performance and fuel efficiency.
  • Service Includes:
    • Replacement of worn or damaged engine components
    • Rebuilding engines if necessary to restore full functionality
    • Post-repair testing to ensure proper engine performance

Routine Engine Maintenance

Regular engine maintenance is key to keeping your engine in peak condition. From oil changes to spark plug replacements, we provide the necessary services to keep your engine running smoothly and efficiently.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Routine maintenance helps prevent engine wear and tear, reduces the risk of breakdowns, and improves fuel economy.
  • Service Includes:
    • Oil changes and filter replacements
    • Spark plug and air filter replacements
    • Coolant and fluid checks

2. Transmission Services

Your transmission is responsible for transferring power from the engine to the wheels. Whether you drive a manual or automatic transmission, regular maintenance and timely repairs are essential for smooth shifting and vehicle performance. At Auto Center, we provide expert transmission services to keep your vehicle running smoothly, from fluid changes to complete transmission rebuilds.

Transmission Diagnostics

If you’re experiencing delayed shifting, slipping gears, or unusual noises, it could be a sign of transmission trouble. Our team uses advanced diagnostic tools to accurately diagnose transmission issues and recommend the right repairs.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Transmission problems can escalate quickly if not addressed. Early diagnosis prevents more serious issues and helps avoid costly repairs.
  • Service Includes:
    • Computerized transmission diagnostics
    • Visual and mechanical inspection of the transmission
    • Test drive to assess performance

Transmission Fluid Change

Transmission fluid plays a vital role in lubricating and cooling your transmission. Over time, this fluid breaks down, leading to overheating, increased wear, and poor performance. Regular transmission fluid changes help keep your transmission running smoothly.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Fresh transmission fluid reduces wear and prevents overheating, which can cause serious transmission damage. It also ensures smoother shifting and improved fuel efficiency.
  • Service Includes:
    • Draining and replacing old transmission fluid
    • Checking for leaks or damage to the transmission system
    • Replacing the transmission filter (if applicable)

Transmission Repairs & Rebuilds

If your transmission is showing signs of serious wear or failure, we offer full transmission repair and rebuild services. From replacing damaged parts to performing a complete rebuild, we’ll restore your transmission’s functionality and reliability.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Transmission repairs can prevent the need for a full replacement, saving you time and money. A rebuilt transmission extends the life of your vehicle and ensures smoother operation.
  • Service Includes:
    • Repairing or replacing worn or damaged transmission components
    • Full transmission rebuilds (if necessary)
    • Post-repair testing and adjustments for optimal performance

3. Cooling System Services

Your engine’s cooling system helps regulate temperature and prevent overheating, which can cause major damage to both the engine and transmission. At Auto Center, we provide cooling system inspections, maintenance, and repairs to ensure your vehicle runs at the right temperature, even under extreme conditions.

Cooling System Inspection

If your vehicle is overheating, or if you’ve noticed a coolant leak, it’s important to get your cooling system inspected. Our technicians will check all components, including the radiator, water pump, hoses, and coolant levels.

  • Why It’s Important:
    An overheating engine can cause permanent damage. Regular inspections help prevent overheating and ensure your cooling system is functioning properly.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspection of radiator, water pump, and hoses
    • Checking coolant levels and condition
    • Pressure testing for leaks

Radiator Repair & Replacement

If your radiator is damaged or leaking, it can’t properly cool your engine. We offer radiator repair and replacement services to ensure your cooling system is operating at its best.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A faulty radiator can lead to engine overheating and significant damage. Repairing or replacing a damaged radiator helps maintain proper engine temperature.
  • Service Includes:
    • Repairing leaks or cracks in the radiator
    • Full radiator replacement (if necessary)
    • Flushing and replacing coolant

item.title: Intro - Electrical & Diagnostic
item.content:encoded: Your vehicle’s electrical system is responsible for powering everything from the headlights to the ignition, while the battery ensures your vehicle starts and runs efficiently. At Auto Center, we offer a full range of electrical and battery services to keep your car running smoothly and safely. From battery replacements to diagnosing electrical problems, our expert technicians are here to ensure that your vehicle’s electrical system is functioning at its best.

item.title: Services - Electrical & Diagnostic
item.content:encoded:
Electrical and diagnostic services we offer

1. Battery Services

Your vehicle's battery is a critical component of its electrical system, providing the power needed to start your engine and operate your electrical components. A healthy battery ensures your vehicle starts reliably, while a weak or failing battery can leave you stranded. At Auto Center, we offer battery testing, replacement, and maintenance services to keep you on the road without any interruptions.

Battery Testing

If you’re experiencing slow starts or dimming lights, it may be a sign that your battery is weakening. Our battery testing service ensures that your battery is holding a charge and functioning properly, so you can avoid an unexpected breakdown.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Testing your battery regularly helps identify potential issues before they become bigger problems. A weak battery can prevent your car from starting, leaving you stranded.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing battery voltage and charge capacity
    • Inspecting battery terminals for corrosion
    • Providing a detailed report on battery health

Battery Replacement

When it’s time for a new battery, we provide fast and efficient battery replacement services. We carry a variety of high-quality batteries for all vehicle makes and models, ensuring that you get the best performance and longevity.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A dead or weak battery can cause starting problems and strain other components of your vehicle’s electrical system. Replacing your battery when needed ensures your vehicle starts reliably and operates smoothly.
  • Service Includes:
    • Removing the old battery
    • Installing a new, manufacturer-recommended battery
    • Cleaning battery terminals and cables
    • Testing the new battery to ensure proper installation

Battery Maintenance

Proper battery maintenance helps prolong the life of your battery and ensures it operates efficiently. We offer services such as terminal cleaning, battery recharging, and visual inspections to keep your battery in top condition.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Regular maintenance helps prevent common battery problems like corrosion, which can cause starting issues and reduce battery life.
  • Service Includes:
    • Cleaning and tightening battery terminals
    • Checking battery fluid levels (if applicable)
    • Recharging low batteries

2. Electrical System Diagnostics & Repair

Your vehicle’s electrical system powers everything from the starter and alternator to your lights, windows, and entertainment systems. A malfunction in the electrical system can cause various issues, including hard starts, dim lights, or non-functioning accessories. Our team specializes in diagnosing and repairing electrical problems to get your vehicle back to full functionality.

Electrical Diagnostics

If your vehicle’s electrical system is acting up, it’s crucial to identify the root cause quickly. We use advanced diagnostic tools to scan for issues in the wiring, alternator, starter, and other electrical components.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A malfunctioning electrical system can affect your vehicle’s performance and safety. Early diagnosis can prevent small problems from turning into expensive repairs.
  • Service Includes:
    • Comprehensive diagnostic testing of electrical components
    • Visual inspection of fuses, wiring, and connections
    • Report of findings and recommended repairs

Alternator Repair & Replacement

The alternator is responsible for charging your battery and powering your vehicle's electrical systems while the engine is running. If your alternator is failing, it can cause your battery to drain quickly or lead to dim lights and electrical failures.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A faulty alternator can prevent your battery from recharging, leading to a dead battery and potential breakdown. Replacing or repairing the alternator ensures your vehicle’s electrical system operates properly.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing the alternator for voltage output
    • Replacing or repairing faulty alternators
    • Ensuring the alternator charges the battery correctly

Starter Motor Repair & Replacement

If your vehicle struggles to start or makes clicking noises when you turn the key, it could be due to a faulty starter motor. We provide starter motor testing and replacement services to ensure your vehicle starts reliably every time.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A malfunctioning starter motor can prevent your vehicle from starting, leaving you stranded. Early repair or replacement avoids unexpected breakdowns.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing the starter motor for function
    • Replacing worn or damaged starter motors
    • Testing the system to ensure proper operation after repair

3. Lighting & Electrical Accessory Repair

Your vehicle's lights, including headlights, brake lights, and interior lights, are essential for visibility and safety. Additionally, electrical accessories such as power windows, locks, and dashboard controls rely on the electrical system to function properly. We provide repair and replacement services for all vehicle lighting and electrical accessories.

Lighting Repair & Replacement

Dim or non-functioning headlights, brake lights, or turn signals can pose serious safety risks. We offer fast and efficient light bulb replacement and headlight restoration services to ensure your vehicle is visible on the road.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Properly functioning lights are essential for night driving and signaling to other drivers. Replacing dim or broken bulbs improves your visibility and safety.
  • Service Includes:
    • Replacing burnt-out bulbs (headlights, taillights, brake lights, etc.)
    • Restoring cloudy or foggy headlight lenses for improved brightness
    • Ensuring all lights are working properly after repair

Power Window & Door Lock Repair

If your power windows or door locks aren’t working, it could be due to an electrical issue. We can diagnose and repair problems with window motors, switches, and door lock actuators, ensuring these important features function properly.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Non-functioning windows or locks can be a safety hazard, especially in emergency situations. Repairing these components ensures your vehicle is secure and convenient to use.
  • Service Includes:
    • Diagnosing and repairing window motor or switch failures
    • Replacing faulty door lock actuators
    • Testing to ensure smooth operation

  • Skilled Technicians: Our team has extensive experience in diagnosing and repairing complex electrical and battery issues for all makes and models.

item.title: Why Choose - Vehicle Inspections & Safety
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose Auto Center for Vehicle Inspections & Safety?

  • Certified Technicians: Our team of ASE-certified technicians is experienced in performing thorough inspections for all makes and models, ensuring your vehicle is in compliance with local regulations and safety standards.
  • Comprehensive Services: From state inspections and emissions tests to pre-purchase evaluations, we provide a wide range of inspection services tailored to your needs.
  • Advanced Diagnostic Tools: We use the latest diagnostic equipment to accurately identify issues and keep your vehicle running safely.
  • Commitment to Safety: Your safety is our priority. We ensure that every vehicle we inspect meets strict safety guidelines, giving you peace of mind on the road.

At Auto Center, we take the safety and reliability of your vehicle seriously. Our thorough inspection services ensure your car is road-ready, keeping you safe and compliant with local regulations.

item.title: Services - Vehicle Inspections & Safety
item.content:encoded:
Inspection and safety services we offer

1. Comprehensive Vehicle Safety Inspections

Your vehicle is a complex machine with multiple systems that must work together to keep you safe on the road. Our comprehensive vehicle safety inspections are designed to assess the overall health of your car, ensuring that key components are functioning properly. From the brakes to the tires, we leave no stone unturned.

What’s Included in Our Vehicle Safety Inspections:

Our certified technicians follow a detailed checklist to thoroughly inspect critical safety systems and components, including:

  • Brakes & Brake Pads: We inspect the condition of your brakes, ensuring they provide reliable stopping power.
  • Tires & Tread Depth: We check tire wear, tread depth, and pressure to ensure you have proper traction and a smooth ride.
  • Steering & Suspension: Our team inspects the steering system and suspension to detect issues that could affect handling and safety.
  • Lights & Signals: All exterior lights, including headlights, brake lights, and turn signals, are inspected to ensure they are functioning properly for visibility and communication with other drivers.
  • Windshield Wipers & Washer Fluid: Proper visibility is essential for safe driving. We check your windshield wipers for wear and ensure your washer fluid is topped off.
  • Seat Belts & Airbags: We examine seat belts for wear or damage and check the airbag system for proper operation.

Why It’s Important:

Routine safety inspections catch potential issues early, allowing you to address them before they turn into costly repairs or safety hazards. By keeping up with inspections, you can drive with confidence knowing your vehicle is in top condition.

2. State & Emissions Inspections

In many states, regular vehicle inspections are required to ensure your car meets emissions and safety standards. At Auto Center, we’re fully licensed to perform state inspections and emissions tests, ensuring your vehicle is compliant with local regulations.

State Inspection

A state inspection assesses whether your vehicle meets the safety standards set by your local Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV). During this process, we inspect vital systems such as brakes, lights, and steering, and check for other issues that could compromise safety.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A state inspection is not only required by law but is also an essential step in making sure your vehicle is roadworthy. Failure to pass an inspection can lead to fines or even the suspension of your vehicle's registration.
  • Service Includes:
    • Comprehensive inspection of safety systems (brakes, steering, lights, etc.)
    • Assessment of vehicle emissions to meet state requirements
    • Providing a detailed report and advising on necessary repairs to pass the inspection

Emissions Testing

Emissions tests measure the pollutants your vehicle emits to ensure they fall within state-mandated limits. We use advanced equipment to check your car’s emissions, ensuring it complies with environmental regulations.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Emissions testing helps reduce the amount of harmful pollutants released into the atmosphere. If your vehicle fails the test, we can diagnose and repair the issue to help your car meet the required standards.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing exhaust emissions using state-approved equipment
    • Diagnosing emissions-related issues (if any)
    • Making necessary repairs to ensure compliance with state regulations

3. Pre-Purchase Vehicle Inspections

Purchasing a used vehicle is a significant investment, and it’s essential to know exactly what you’re buying. Our pre-purchase vehicle inspection service gives you a clear understanding of a car’s condition before you make a decision. This inspection helps you avoid potential problems down the road and ensures you’re getting a reliable vehicle.

What’s Included in Our Pre-Purchase Inspections:

We perform a comprehensive examination of the vehicle, focusing on both mechanical and cosmetic aspects. Our inspection covers:

  • Engine & Transmission: Checking for any signs of wear, leaks, or potential problems.
  • Brakes & Tires: Ensuring the brake system is functioning correctly and that the tires have sufficient tread and are free of damage.
  • Suspension & Steering: Examining the suspension components and steering system for smooth operation.
  • Exterior & Body Condition: Assessing the condition of the bodywork, checking for signs of previous damage or rust.
  • Interior Components: Verifying that all interior features, including the heating, air conditioning, and electronics, are working properly.

Why It’s Important:

A pre-purchase inspection can save you from unexpected repair costs and ensure you’re making a sound investment. It provides valuable insights into the car’s current condition and any repairs it may need, helping you make an informed decision.

4. Diagnostic Inspections for Warning Lights

Is your dashboard lit up with warning lights? Ignoring these indicators can lead to more serious issues down the road. At Auto Center, we offer diagnostic inspections to determine the root cause of warning lights such as the "Check Engine" light, ABS light, or tire pressure warnings.

Diagnostic Tools & Process:

We use state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to read your vehicle’s computer system, identifying the exact code responsible for the warning light. From there, we can pinpoint the issue and recommend the necessary repairs.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A warning light is your car’s way of telling you something is wrong. Early diagnosis can prevent minor problems from becoming major repairs.
  • Service Includes:
    • Reading the diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) stored in the vehicle’s computer
    • Comprehensive inspection of the affected system
    • Providing a report on the issue and recommended repairs

5. Preventive Maintenance Inspections

Preventive maintenance is key to extending the life of your vehicle and avoiding costly repairs. Our preventive maintenance inspections are designed to catch wear-and-tear issues before they escalate. During these inspections, we check fluid levels, belts, hoses, and other vital components.

What’s Included:

  • Fluid Checks: Ensuring your engine oil, coolant, transmission fluid, brake fluid, and other essential fluids are at the correct levels and free of contamination.
  • Belts & Hoses: Inspecting for signs of wear, cracks, or leaks that could cause breakdowns.
  • Battery Health: Testing your battery to ensure it’s holding a charge and providing adequate power.

Why It’s Important:

Routine preventive maintenance reduces the likelihood of breakdowns and keeps your vehicle running efficiently. It also helps avoid more expensive repairs by addressing small issues early.

item.title: Intro - Vehicle Inspections & Safety
item.content:encoded: Ensuring that your vehicle is safe and compliant with local regulations is essential for protecting you, your passengers, and other drivers on the road. Regular vehicle inspections help identify potential issues before they become serious problems, and they keep your car in line with safety and emissions standards. At Auto Center, we offer comprehensive vehicle inspections and safety services to give you peace of mind, whether you're preparing for a road trip, a state inspection, or just routine maintenance.

item.title: Why Choose - Windshield & Glass
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose Auto Center for Windshield & Glass Services?

  • Expert Technicians: Our certified technicians are highly trained and experienced in all aspects of auto glass repair and replacement.
  • High-Quality Materials: We use only the best materials, including OEM or OEM-equivalent glass, to ensure durability and a perfect fit.
  • Fast & Efficient Service: We know your time is valuable. Our team works efficiently to get you back on the road as quickly as possible without compromising quality.
  • Insurance Assistance: We work with most insurance companies to help cover the cost of windshield and glass repairs or replacements.

At Auto Center, we’re committed to keeping your vehicle’s windshield and glass in pristine condition, ensuring your safety and enhancing your driving experience. Let us handle all your auto glass needs with our professional, reliable services!

item.title: Services - Windshield & Glass
item.content:encoded:
Windshield and glass services we offer

1. Windshield Repair

A small crack or chip in your windshield may not seem like a big deal, but even minor damage can quickly spread, compromising your safety. Windshield repairs are often a fast and cost-effective solution to restore the structural integrity of your windshield without the need for a full replacement. At Auto Center, we specialize in quick and effective windshield repair services that stop cracks from spreading and ensure your windshield remains strong.

Benefits of Windshield Repair:

  • Cost-Effective: Repairing a chip or crack is much less expensive than a full windshield replacement.
  • Quick Turnaround: Our windshield repair process is efficient, often taking less than an hour.
  • Prevents Further Damage: Repairing cracks early prevents them from spreading and compromising the structural integrity of the glass.

What We Fix:

  • Small Cracks: Cracks that are shorter than a few inches can usually be repaired.
  • Chips & Star Breaks: Chips, star breaks, and bullseyes caused by flying debris can be quickly filled and sealed.

How It Works:

Our technicians use advanced repair technology to fill in the crack or chip with a specialized resin. Once cured, the repair strengthens the glass and restores clarity to the damaged area.

2. Windshield Replacement

If the damage to your windshield is too extensive to repair, or if the crack obstructs your line of sight, a full windshield replacement may be necessary. Driving with a severely damaged windshield is unsafe and can result in fines in some states. At Auto Center, we offer professional windshield replacement services that ensure your new windshield is installed to factory standards for maximum safety and performance.

Why Windshield Replacement is Necessary:

  • Extensive Damage: Cracks longer than a few inches or chips that affect the driver's line of sight typically require replacement.
  • Structural Integrity: Your windshield provides up to 30% of your vehicle’s structural strength. A severely damaged windshield compromises this protection.
  • Safety: In the event of a collision, a properly installed windshield helps support the airbag deployment and prevents passengers from being ejected.

Our Windshield Replacement Process:

  1. Assessment: We assess the damage to determine whether repair or replacement is necessary.
  2. Removal: The damaged windshield is carefully removed to avoid damaging the surrounding areas.
  3. Installation: A high-quality windshield is installed using advanced adhesives to ensure a secure and long-lasting bond.
  4. Quality Check: We inspect the installation to ensure a perfect fit and test for leaks or other issues.

3. Side & Rear Window Replacement

Side and rear windows are just as important as your windshield when it comes to safety, visibility, and comfort. Whether it’s due to an accident, vandalism, or a stray object, damaged side or rear windows should be replaced as soon as possible. At Auto Center, we offer side and rear window replacement services that restore your vehicle’s safety and appearance quickly.

Why You Need to Replace Broken Windows:

  • Safety Concerns: A broken side or rear window can allow water, debris, or intruders to enter your vehicle.
  • Weather Protection: Damaged windows leave your vehicle vulnerable to the elements.
  • Structural Support: Side and rear windows contribute to the overall strength of your vehicle's structure.

Our Window Replacement Process:

  • Glass Removal: We remove the broken or damaged glass carefully to avoid further damage.
  • New Glass Installation: High-quality, OEM-equivalent glass is installed to fit your vehicle perfectly.
  • Sealing & Testing: We ensure the new windows are sealed properly to prevent leaks, and we test for any air or water entry points.

4. Power Window Repair

Power windows offer convenience, but over time, the mechanical components—such as the motor, switch, or regulator—can wear out, leading to windows that won’t roll up or down properly. If your power windows are stuck, slow to move, or making unusual noises, we can help. At Auto Center, our skilled technicians provide fast, reliable power window repairs to restore smooth operation.

Common Power Window Issues:

  • Slow or Stuck Windows: A worn motor or regulator can cause windows to move slowly or not at all.
  • Unusual Noises: Grinding, clicking, or other sounds when operating your windows could indicate mechanical problems.
  • Unresponsive Switches: A faulty switch may prevent your windows from moving when you press the button.

How We Fix Power Windows:

  • Motor Replacement: If the motor is worn out or failing, we’ll replace it with a new, high-quality part.
  • Regulator Repair: The window regulator is responsible for moving the glass up and down. We repair or replace broken regulators to restore normal function.
  • Switch Repair: If the switch is the problem, we’ll replace or repair it to ensure your windows work as they should.

5. Windshield Wiper Replacement & Repair

Clear visibility is essential for safe driving, especially during harsh weather conditions. Your windshield wipers play a vital role in maintaining that visibility, but over time, the blades can wear out, leading to streaks or poor performance. At Auto Center, we offer windshield wiper replacement and repair services to ensure you have a clear view of the road ahead.

Signs You Need New Windshield Wipers:

  • Streaks on the Glass: If your wipers leave streaks or smudges, it’s time for new blades.
  • Skipping or Chattering: Wipers that skip or chatter across the windshield aren’t making proper contact with the glass.
  • Cracked or Torn Blades: Worn-out blades can’t clear the windshield effectively, compromising your visibility.

Our Wiper Services:

  • Wiper Blade Replacement: We’ll replace your old wiper blades with high-quality ones that provide smooth, streak-free performance.
  • Wiper Arm Adjustment: If your wiper arms are misaligned, we can adjust them to ensure they make proper contact with the glass.

6. Windshield Protection & Glass Treatments

Preventing damage before it happens is the best way to extend the life of your windshield and auto glass. At Auto Center, we offer windshield protection services and glass treatments to shield your vehicle from chips, cracks, and the elements.

Glass Protection Services:

  • Windshield Coatings: We apply specialized coatings to your windshield that improve its resistance to cracks and chips caused by road debris.
  • Rain Repellent Treatment: Our rain-repellent treatment helps water bead and roll off your windshield, improving visibility in wet conditions.

Benefits of Glass Treatments:

  • Enhanced Durability: Protective coatings can help prevent chips and cracks, reducing the need for repairs or replacement.
  • Improved Visibility: Rain-repellent treatments help you see better in heavy rain, sleet, or snow.
  • Easier Cleaning: Treated glass repels dirt and water, making it easier to keep your windows clean.

item.title: Intro - Windshield & Glass
item.content:encoded: Your vehicle’s windshield and windows aren’t just for visibility—they’re crucial components for your safety, providing structural support, weather protection, and impact resistance. At Auto Center, we offer comprehensive windshield and glass services, including repairs, replacements, and protective treatments. Whether it’s a small chip or a cracked window, our experienced technicians ensure your auto glass is in top condition to keep you and your passengers safe.

item.title: Intro - Heating & Cooling
item.content:encoded: Your vehicle’s heating, cooling, and exhaust systems play critical roles in both your comfort and the performance of your car. A well-maintained heating and cooling system ensures you stay comfortable in all weather conditions, while a properly functioning exhaust system protects the environment and improves engine efficiency. At Auto Center, we provide comprehensive services to keep these vital systems in top shape. From AC and heater repairs to exhaust maintenance, our expert technicians have you covered.

item.title: Services - Heating & Cooling
item.content:encoded:
Heating, cooling and exhaust services we offer

1. Heating & Cooling System Services

The heating and cooling systems in your vehicle are essential for your comfort, whether you're facing extreme summer heat or winter chills. A malfunctioning air conditioning or heating system can not only make driving uncomfortable but can also indicate other issues within your vehicle's cooling system that could affect the engine. At Auto Center, we offer a full range of heating and cooling services to keep your vehicle running efficiently and your cabin comfortable year-round.

Air Conditioning Repair & Recharge

When your vehicle's air conditioning isn’t cooling properly, it may need a recharge or repair. Our certified technicians can diagnose the issue, whether it's low refrigerant, a faulty compressor, or a leak in the system. We’ll get your AC blowing cold again with fast and effective repairs.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A well-functioning air conditioning system is essential for comfort, especially during hot summer months. Regular maintenance and timely repairs ensure your system operates efficiently.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing the air conditioning system for leaks or malfunctions
    • Recharging the AC system with the proper refrigerant
    • Repairing or replacing damaged components (compressor, condenser, etc.)
    • Ensuring the system blows cold air consistently

Heating System Repair

If your heater is blowing cold air or isn’t working at all, it may be a sign of a problem with your heater core, thermostat, or coolant levels. Our team can quickly diagnose and repair heating system issues to restore warmth to your vehicle during colder months.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A malfunctioning heater not only makes for an uncomfortable ride but can also indicate deeper issues with the vehicle's cooling system. Proper heating is essential for defrosting and maintaining visibility in winter.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspecting the heater core, thermostat, and coolant levels
    • Flushing the cooling system to remove debris or blockages
    • Replacing faulty parts to restore proper heating function
    • Ensuring warm air is distributed evenly through the cabin

Radiator Repair & Replacement

The radiator is a key component of your vehicle’s cooling system, responsible for preventing the engine from overheating. If your engine is running hot, or you notice coolant leaks, it may be time to have your radiator inspected. We offer repair and replacement services to keep your engine at the right temperature.

  • Why It’s Important:
    An overheated engine can lead to severe and costly damage. Maintaining a healthy radiator is essential for preventing engine overheating and ensuring optimal performance.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspecting the radiator for leaks, corrosion, or blockages
    • Flushing and refilling the coolant
    • Repairing or replacing the radiator as needed
    • Testing the system to ensure proper cooling function

Thermostat & Water Pump Service

The thermostat and water pump work together to regulate the temperature of your engine and ensure that coolant is circulating properly. A faulty thermostat or water pump can lead to overheating and engine damage. We provide diagnostic and repair services to keep these components functioning efficiently.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A failing thermostat or water pump can cause engine overheating, which can lead to serious mechanical issues. Replacing these parts at the first sign of trouble helps prevent more costly repairs.
  • Service Includes:
    • Testing the thermostat for proper operation
    • Inspecting the water pump for leaks or wear
    • Replacing faulty components to restore the cooling system
    • Flushing the system and refilling with new coolant

2. Exhaust System Services

Your vehicle’s exhaust system plays a crucial role in reducing emissions, improving fuel efficiency, and ensuring your engine runs smoothly. It’s responsible for directing harmful gases away from the vehicle and reducing noise. If you notice loud noises, decreased performance, or unusual smells, your exhaust system may need attention. At Auto Center, we provide a full range of exhaust services, from minor repairs to full exhaust replacements.

Exhaust Leak Repair

Exhaust leaks can occur due to corrosion, damage, or wear and tear, and they can affect your vehicle’s performance, fuel efficiency, and safety. We’ll inspect your exhaust system for leaks and make necessary repairs to ensure your vehicle runs efficiently and safely.

  • Why It’s Important:
    Exhaust leaks can allow harmful gases, such as carbon monoxide, to enter the cabin, posing serious health risks. Addressing leaks promptly is essential for your safety and your vehicle's performance.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspecting the exhaust system for leaks or damage
    • Repairing or replacing damaged sections of the exhaust system
    • Ensuring proper sealing and alignment of the exhaust pipes

Muffler Replacement & Repair

A failing muffler can lead to excessive noise and reduced engine efficiency. Whether your muffler is damaged or corroded, we can replace or repair it to restore quiet operation and optimal vehicle performance.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A damaged muffler not only makes your vehicle louder but can also reduce fuel efficiency and increase emissions. Replacing it ensures a smoother, quieter ride and better fuel economy.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspecting the muffler for damage, rust, or wear
    • Replacing or repairing the muffler to reduce noise and improve efficiency
    • Ensuring the exhaust system is properly aligned and secure

Catalytic Converter Replacement

The catalytic converter reduces harmful emissions from your vehicle by converting toxic gases into less harmful substances. If your catalytic converter is damaged or clogged, it can affect engine performance and lead to failed emissions tests. We offer catalytic converter replacement services to ensure your vehicle meets emissions standards.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A damaged catalytic converter can result in higher emissions, poor fuel economy, and even engine damage. Replacing it helps your vehicle run cleaner and more efficiently.
  • Service Includes:
    • Inspecting the catalytic converter for damage or clogs
    • Replacing the catalytic converter with a high-quality, emissions-compliant part
    • Ensuring the exhaust system functions properly after replacement

Full Exhaust System Replacement

If your exhaust system is severely damaged or corroded, a full exhaust system replacement may be necessary. We can install a new exhaust system that meets or exceeds OEM standards, ensuring your vehicle operates quietly, efficiently, and with reduced emissions.

  • Why It’s Important:
    A failing exhaust system can lead to poor performance, increased noise, and higher emissions. A full replacement restores your vehicle's performance and ensures compliance with emissions regulations.
  • Service Includes:
    • Removing the old exhaust system and installing a new one
    • Ensuring all components are properly fitted and sealed
    • Testing the exhaust system for noise reduction and emissions compliance

item.title: Why Choose - Heating & Cooling
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose Auto Center for Heating, Cooling & Exhaust Services?

  • Experienced Technicians: Our ASE-certified technicians have extensive experience in diagnosing and repairing heating, cooling, and exhaust systems for all makes and models.
  • State-of-the-Art Equipment: We use advanced diagnostic tools and equipment to accurately diagnose issues and ensure long-lasting repairs.
  • High-Quality Parts: We only use premium parts to ensure the durability and performance of your heating, cooling, and exhaust systems.
  • Comprehensive Services: From routine maintenance to major repairs, we provide complete solutions to keep your vehicle comfortable, efficient, and environmentally friendly.

At Auto Center, we’re committed to ensuring your vehicle’s heating, cooling, and exhaust systems are in optimal condition, keeping you comfortable and your car running smoothly.

item.title: Front Page
item.content:encoded:
Professional
Auto Repair & Maintenance
Services since 1996

Maintenance

  • Oil Changes
  • Fluid Checks & Top-ups
  • Tune-Ups
  • Battery Services

Tires & Wheels

  • Tire Services
    (Rotation, Balancing,
    Alignment, Replacement)
  • Wheel Alignment

Brakes & Suspension

  • Brake Services
  • Suspension
  • Steering Repairs

Engine & Transmission

  • Engine Repairs
  • Diagnostics
  • Transmission Services

Heating, Cooling & Exhaust

  • Air Conditioning
  • Heating Services
  • Exhaust System Repairs

Electrical

  • Electrical System Repairs
  • Engine Diagnostics

Vehicle Inspections

  • Inspection Services
  • Safety
  • Emissions Testing

Glass & Windshield

  • Repairs
  • Replacement
  • Auto Glass

About the Auto Center

At Auto Center, we are dedicated to providing top-quality auto repair and maintenance services to keep your vehicle running smoothly and safely. With a team of certified technicians and a commitment to customer satisfaction, we offer a wide range of services, from routine maintenance to complex repairs. Trust us to deliver reliable care and exceptional service every time.

  • Certified and experienced technicians
  • Comprehensive auto repair and maintenance services
  • State-of-the-art diagnostic tools and equipment
